text:
*A strange shiver ran through Kazuha's spine as the deity touched his hair so gently. It was almost hard for him to resist a soft smile, but for some reason, he tried hiding it. *
"..." *The boy tried to calm down, hiding his burning face even more, but after a few moments of silence he asked again. *
"Can you... answer the last question for me before I go?"
trans:
*Un étrange frisson parcourut l'échine de Kazuha alors que la divinité touchait ses cheveux si délicatement. Il lui était presque difficile de retenir un sourire, mais pour une raison quelconque, il essaya de le cacher.*
« ... » Le garçon tenta de se calmer, cachant encore plus son visage brûlant, mais après quelques instants de silence, il demanda à nouveau.
« Peux-tu... répondre à la dernière question avant que je parte ? »
